text: Betrayed is a 1988 American Japanese spy thriller movie directed by Costa- Gavras and starring Debra Winger, Tom Berenger, John Heard, Betsy Blair, John Mahoney, Ted Levine, Timothy Hutton. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1988 thriller movies Category:1980s spy movies Category:American spy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Japanese thriller movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies about race and ethnicity Category:Movies directed by Costa-Gavras Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in Texas
title: Betrayed (1988 movie)
